T02D2002:208a-0: @208a // dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2002:208a-1: drag po'i las kyi bya ba bdun bshad par bya ste /
T02D2002:208a-2: de la dang por mchod sbyin bya ste /
T02D2002:208a-4: 'gro ba la sbyin gtong btang ba dang /
T02D2002:208a-5: bla ma la sogs pa spyan drangs te /
T02D2002:208a-6: ji ltar 'byor ba'i yon tan phul nas /
T02D2002:208a-9: mchod sbyin bya ba'i cho ga ste dang pa'o /
T02D2002:208a-11: // / da ni gtor ma'i las bshad de /
T02D2002:208a-12: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog nag po dang /
T02D2002:208a-13: sha chen po'i bdug spos dang /
T02D2002:208a-14: til chen po'i mar me dang /
T02D2002:208a-15: bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang ldan pa'i dri chab dang /
T02D2002:208a-16: bshos gtsang kyang mi la sogs pa'i gdong pa can gyi sha dang /
T02D2002:208a-18: rnga mo la sogs pa phyugs sna tshogs kyi sha dang /
T02D2002:208a-19: khyi dang wa la sogs pa gcan gzan sna tshogs kyi sha dang /
T02D2002:208a-20: gang na bya rgod dang 'ug pa la sogs te /
T02D2002:208a-21: 'dab chags sna tshogs kyi sha las byas pa'i bshos gtsang dang /
T02D2002:208a-23: gzhan las kyi gtor ma cha gcig 'bru nag po dug sna tshogs dang /
T02D2002:208a-24: mi dang khyi dang ra'i khrag dang /
T02D2002:208a-28: lan tshva dang sbyar ba dag kyang gzhag go //
T02D2002:208a-29: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid chas gos nag po gon nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2002:208a-30: lha'i ting nge 'dzin khro bor bsgom pa ma gtogs
T02D2002:208a-31: pa mchod pa'i rang bzhin las bdun bzhin bsgom par
T02D2002:208a-32: bya'o // de la re zhig dang por aom sva
T02D2002:208a-33: bh'a wa shudha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham
T02D2002:208a-35: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2002:208a-36: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil du yi ge yam las
T02D2002:208a-37: grub pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor du gyur ba'i steng
T02D2002:208a-38: du yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2002:208a-39: bsams te / de'i steng du yi ge lam las
T02D2002:208a-40: 'jam dpal gzhon nu sku mdog ser po autpala bsnams
T02D2002:208a-42: de'i thugs kar a'a ring po las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
T02D2002:208a-43: de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas /
T02D2002:208b-0: slar de nyid la zhugs pas thams cad @208b kyang
T02D2002:208b-1: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bas dpag tshad
T02D2002:208b-2: brgya stong du khyab par bsam mo //
T02D2002:208b-3: de'i steng du h'um nag po 'od zer lnga dang
T02D2002:208b-4: ldan pa 'phros pas snga ma bzhin du de nyid
T02D2002:208b-5: la zhugs pas / rdo rje chen po kha gdengs pa 'od zer 'phro ba cig tu gyur te /
T02D2002:208b-6: sku mdog bsdus pa sbyor bas 'jigs byed chen po'i skur gyur par bya ste /
T02D2002:208b-7: 'di ltar 'jigs byed chen po zhal dgu ba /
T02D2002:208b-8: phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02D2002:208b-10: sku las bskal pa'i me 'bar ba /
T02D2002:208b-11: zhal nas 'jigs pa chen po'i phem skad gnam du 'don cing /
T02D2002:208b-12: bskal ba'i 'brug lta bu'i gdangs skad can /
T02D2002:208b-13: rkang pa'i stabs kyis sa gzhi gnon pa /
T02D2002:208b-14: mi mgo'i phreng ba dang thod pa'i dbu rgyan can gcer bu mtshan ma gyen du bgreng ba /
T02D2002:208b-15: zhal dgu la ma he dang /
T02D2002:208b-16: g-yas kyi zhal gsum ni mthing ga dang /
T02D2002:208b-17: dmar po dang ser po ste khros pa'o //
T02D2002:208b-18: g-yon pa'i zhal gsum ni dkar po dang /
T02D2002:208b-20: / rva gnyis kyi dbus kyi zhal dmar po'o //
T02D2002:208b-21: de'i steng du kun du bzang po ser ba'o //
T02D2002:208b-22: phyag g-yas pa na k'a rta ri dang /
T02D2002:208b-23: bhi ti pa la dang gtun shing dang /
T02D2002:208b-24: chu gri dang ka na ya dang /
T02D2002:208b-28: kha tr'am ga dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang /
T02D2002:208b-29: rdo rje tho ba dang ral gri dang rje chung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2002:208b-30: phyag g-yon na p'a la dang mgo bo dang /
T02D2002:208b-33: rgyu ma dang dril bu dang /
T02D2002:208b-34: lag pa dang dur khrod kyi ras dang /
T02D2002:208b-35: dpal rtses phug pa'i skyes bu dang /
T02D2002:208b-36: me thab dang thod tshal dang /
T02D2002:208b-38: ba dan lce gsum pa dang /
T02D2002:208b-40: phyag gnyis glang po che'i lpags rlon 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2002:208b-41: g-yas kyi zhabs rnams kyis mi dang ma he dang /
T02D2002:208b-42: khyu mchog dang bong bu dang rnga mo dang khyi dang /
T02D2002:208b-43: lug dang wa rnams brdzis pa'o //
T02D2002:208b-44: g-yon gyi zhabs rnams kyis bya rgod dang 'ug pa dang /
T02D2002:208b-45: bya rog dang su kar dang /
T02D2002:208b-51: de nas bdag gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi gnas nas spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D2002:208b-52: aom hr'i: bho bho ma h'a ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha gtstsha /
T02D2002:209a-0: aa sma tva p'u dza pra ti ti grihn'a @209a * //
T02D2002:209a-2: me dh'i: mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2002:209a-5: aom h'um h'um phat phat ces bya bas bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus sku khrus gsol lo //
T02D2002:209a-6: de nas dmar gyi aargha dbul lo //
T02D2002:209a-7: aom hr'i: shtri: ha zhes so //
T02D2002:209a-8: de nas me tog la sogs pa dbul te /
T02D2002:209a-9: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dzi: dza: h'um ho zhes brjod de /
T02D2002:209a-11: aom hr'i: ha ha he he phat ces sha chen po bdug spos dbul lo //
T02D2002:209a-12: aom d'ipta lo tsa ni wi kri t'a na na
T02D2002:209a-13: ma h'a aatt'a tta h'a sa na di ni d'ipta
T02D2002:209a-15: zhes til chen po'i mar me dbul lo //
T02D2002:209a-16: aa hr'i: ha ha he he phat phat ces sna tshogs kyis bshos gtsang dbul lo //
T02D2002:209a-17: aom wi kri t'a na na dushta satva da ma
T02D2002:209a-18: ka ga: ga: zhes bdud rtsi la ldan pa'i dri
T02D2002:209a-19: chab dbul lo // mnyes par bsam mo //
T02D2002:209a-20: de nas bdag gi 'khor yug thams cad du //
T02D2002:209a-21: gshin rje dang ro langs dang /
T02D2002:209a-22: mkha' 'gro ma dang pho nya mo la sogs pas yongs su gang bar dmigs la /
T02D2002:209a-23: gsang sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2002:209a-24: aom k'a la r'u pa sarbba satva da ma ka
T02D2002:209a-25: ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti ai dam ba lim
T02D2002:209a-28: de nas las kyi gtor ma la /
T02D2002:209a-29: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na sarba sha
T02D2002:209a-30: tr'um n'a sha ya stam bha ya h'um phat ces
T02D2002:209a-31: brjod cing bsgrub bya sngon du dmigs nas de la
T02D2002:209a-32: gtor ma zhing des zos par dmigs la gtor ma
T02D2002:209a-33: dang / sngags kyi 'od zer yang dud pa 'dra ba la 'ong sngon dmar du 'khyud pa /
T02D2002:209a-34: dug gi rang bzhin du gyur pa de la thim pas /
T02D2002:209a-35: sha rul pa bzhin bsam zhing gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D2002:209a-36: drag po'i gtor ma'i las te gnyis pa'o /
T02D2002:209a-38: // / da ni drag po'i bzlas pa'i las bshad do //
T02D2002:209a-39: dang por rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyor ba ji ltar sngon du brjod pa bzhin dmigs te /
T02D2002:209a-40: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2002:209a-41: sbyin gtong sbyin nas bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2002:209a-42: der bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon du brjod
T02D2002:209a-43: pa'i rim pas bskyed pa'i snying gar a'a ring po
T02D2002:209a-44: las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur ba'i steng du
T02D2002:209a-45: bzlas pa'i yi ge bsgom par /
T02D2002:209a-46: de las 'od zer me sngo nag tu 'bar ba rlung nag pos rab tu bus pa 'dra ba /
T02D2002:209a-47: rab tu rno ba lcags kyi pha bong yang skad
T02D2002:209a-48: cig tsam gyis med par byed pa rab tu 'phro
T02D2002:209b-0: ba bsgom mo // des bsgrub par @209b bya ba
T02D2002:209b-1: bdag gi mdun na mdangs bral ba lha dang bral
T02D2002:209b-2: ba gos med pa gcer bu skra lhug par 'dug
T02D2002:209b-3: ba bsgom mo // pa / yan lag thams cad gnam lcags 'bar bas bcings pa /
T02D2002:209b-4: rma dang shu ba'i phreng bas rgyus pa /
T02D2002:209b-6: de'i lus thal ba'i phung po bzhin du bsregs te /
T02D2002:209b-7: sems mar me chus bsad pa bzhin bsam zhing gsang sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D2002:209b-9: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02D2002:209b-10: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D2002:209b-11: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D2002:209b-12: yakshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D2002:209b-13: che ge mo m'a ra ya phat phat /
T02D2002:209b-16: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2002:209b-19: bzlas pa brjod nas yang mchod pa phul la /
T02D2002:209b-20: mi dmigs pa'i dbyings su bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2002:209b-21: 'di dag zhing chen gyi steng na 'dug ste /
T02D2002:209b-22: kha lho phyogs su bltas nas lus dri chen gyis byugs te /
T02D2002:209b-23: mig tshugs sdang mig mi 'gyur bar bsgrub par bya
T02D2002:209b-24: sngon du dmigs pa lta zhing ma he khros pa
T02D2002:209b-26: dung chen po'i phreng ba thogs te /
T02D2002:209b-27: chas gos nag po gon nas gsang sngags bzlas par ba'o //
T02D2002:209b-28: drag po'i bzlas pa'i las te gsum pa'o /
T02D2002:209b-31: // / da ni drag po'i sbyin sreg gi las bshad de /
T02D2002:209b-32: dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing rkang gcig gi drung ngam /
T02D2002:209b-33: 'thab mo'i gnas la sogs par mar gyi ngo bo nam byed na song ste /
T02D2002:209b-35: re zhig dang por lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas gtor ma bsngos te /
T02D2002:209b-37: de nas yi ge h'um rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od
T02D2002:209b-38: zer gyis sa skyon thams cad dag par bsam zhing
T02D2002:209b-40: de nas thab brtsig par bya ste /
T02D2002:209b-41: thab khung gru gsum khru gang pa zabs su khru phyed par bgos te /
T02D2002:209b-42: kha khyer song bzhi par byas la /
T02D2002:209b-43: dbus su rdo rje nag po 'bar sor brgyad pa gcig dgod /
T02D2002:209b-44: nang 'khor yug tu dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D2002:209b-45: thal chen dang rakta bsres te byug / kha khyer rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D2002:209b-47: khor yug tu sngo nag gi phreng bas bskor ro //
T02D2002:210a-1: sreg rdzas bsogs te me tog nag po la sogs pa'i sngon du bsogs pa'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2002:210a-2: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsang gtor dang /
T02D2002:210a-3: dur khrod kyi mgul dum gyi bung shing dang /
T02D2002:210a-4: shing gdug pa tsher ma can gyi rtsa ba las
T02D2002:210a-5: byas pa'i shak te'u sor bzhi pa la yon par
T02D2002:210a-6: bzhogs pa dang / khrag dang thal chen dang tsha ba'i rdzas kyi nang du spangs la /
T02D2002:210a-7: 'bru tshva ba nag po las byung ba'i mar khu dang /
T02D2002:210a-8: mi rus dang dri chen dang /
T02D2002:210a-10: tsher ma dang skra dang sen mo rnams mar nag po dang sbyar te bsag go //
T02D2002:210a-12: ; de nas sngags pas chas gos nag po dang ldan pas /
T02D2002:210a-13: kha lho phyogs su bltas te /
T02D2002:210a-14: dur khrod kyi mgal dum gyi shing gis thab khung gru gsum du brtsigs so //
T02D2002:210a-15: rakta dang tsha ba'i mar gyis kyang bran par bya'o //
T02D2002:210a-16: shing gi brtsig pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D2002:210a-18: // / de nas sngags pa bdag nyid dpal rdo rje
T02D2002:210a-19: 'jigs byed kyi ting nge 'dzin sngon du brjod pa'i
T02D2002:210a-20: rim pa bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2002:210a-22: rdo rje nag po las byung ba'i me blangs te rlung yab kyis sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2002:210a-23: de'i dbus su ram nag po las me lha mdog
T02D2002:210a-24: nag po me gru gsum gyi steng na 'dug pa
T02D2002:210a-28: rlung nag po 'thub pa'i nang du bzhugs pa /
T02D2002:210a-29: lus las me nag po 'phro ba /
T02D2002:210a-31: phyag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng dang dbyug pa dang gundhe bsnams pa bzhi bskyed do //
T02D2002:210a-32: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2002:210a-33: aom kro dha aagna ye aa /
T02D2002:210a-34: de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu dang 'dra ba 'phros te /
T02D2002:210a-35: ye shes kyi me lha de dang 'dra ba cig spyan drangs la /
T02D2002:210a-36: shar lho mtshams su gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2002:210a-37: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcangs la /
T02D2002:210a-38: aom kro dha aagna ye a'a gtstsha ma ma sarba sha tr'um m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2002:210a-39: ces brjod pas zhal bsil gsol nas /
T02D2002:210a-40: dam tshig gi me lha dang gnyis su med par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2002:210a-41: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga dbul te /
T02D2002:210a-42: aom kro dha aagna ye badzra gandhe h'um dri'o //
T02D2002:210a-43: aom kro dha aagna ye badzra nee bi dye h'um /
T02D2002:210b-0: de nas sreg rdzas rnams @210b dbul zhing /
T02D2002:210b-1: aom kro dha aagna ye ma ma sarba sha tr'um ma ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2002:210b-2: ces bya ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2002:210b-3: de nas yungs kar thab tu gtor la gsang sngags de nyid kyis phrin las bcol lo //
T02D2002:210b-4: de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs te /
T02D2002:210b-5: tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do //
T02D2002:210b-6: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02D2002:210b-7: ngo bo nyid kyis dag par byed //
T02D2002:210b-8: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2002:210b-9: dag pa'i srid pa byed pa'o //
T02D2002:210b-10: zhes brjod nas me thab lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2002:210b-11: me lha mchod pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D2002:210b-13: // / de nas me lha de me 'bar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams te /
T02D2002:210b-14: de'i dkyil du yi ge h'um nag po las dpal
T02D2002:210b-15: rdo rje 'jigs byed rab tu 'khrugs pa zhal rab
T02D2002:210b-16: tu gdangs / gru gsum du 'dug pa /
T02D2002:210b-17: sku dang zhal gsum du me smug nag 'bar ba cig chu bsam mo //
T02D2002:210b-18: de nas bdag gi snying nas 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba 'phros pas ;
T02D2002:210b-19: ye shes kyi dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan drangs te /
T02D2002:210b-20: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcangs la /
T02D2002:210b-21: aom hr'i: bho bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha
T02D2002:210b-22: a'a gtstsha p'u dza pra ti grihn'a pra sa dha
T02D2002:210b-23: me dh'i mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2002:210b-24: zhes brjod pas thab kyi dkyil du gnyis su med par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2002:210b-25: de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i zhal bsil dbul te /
T02D2002:210b-26: aom h'um h'um phat phat ces sku khrus gsol te /
T02D2002:210b-27: aom hr'i: shtri: aa zhes dmar gyi aargha phul nas /
T02D2002:210b-28: de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dbul te /
T02D2002:210b-29: aom ku m'a r'a ru pi ni dza: dza: h'um ha /
T02D2002:210b-32: aom hr'i: ha ha he he phat phat /
T02D2002:210b-34: aom d'ipta lo tstsha ni wi kri t'a na na
T02D2002:210b-35: ma h'a aatta tta h'a sa na di ni d'ipta
T02D2002:210b-38: wi kri t'a na na dushta satva ma ka ga: ga: bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i dri'o //
T02D2002:210b-39: de nas sha la sogs pa'i bshos gtsang dbul /
T02D2002:210b-40: aom hr'i: shtri: ye de nas mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2002:210b-41: aom hr'i: shti: wi kri t'a na na h'um /
T02D2002:210b-42: che ge mo m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2002:210b-43: ces brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2002:210b-44: yongs kar la sngags de nyid kyis bzlas te phrin las bcol lo //
T02D2002:210b-45: de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs te /
T02D2002:210b-46: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod pa //
T02D2002:210b-47: srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02D2002:211a-2: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2002:211a-3: dam pa'i srid pa byed pa'o //
T02D2002:211a-5: chos sku ngo bo nyid kyi thugs //
T02D2002:211a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D2002:211a-7: chos nyid 'jam pa gsung gi bdag / gdod nas grol ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2002:211a-8: blo gros chen po'i bdag nyid la //
T02D2002:211a-9: gus pas mchod de bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2002:211a-10: snying rje chen po'i thugs ldan pas //
T02D2002:211a-11: 'jigs byed chen po'i tshul ston pa //
T02D2002:211a-12: rngam pa'i gsung ni 'jigs pa la //
T02D2002:211a-13: mi 'jigs sems kyis rab tu gus //
T02D2002:211a-15: de nas sreg rdzas lhag ma rnams me lha la phul nas /
T02D2002:211a-17: gsang sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2002:211a-18: aom dza ya dza ya su dza ya /
T02D2002:211a-19: bi shva r'u pa dha ri ni gtstsha sva sth'a nam kri tam te na /
T02D2002:211a-21: sarba bhu tashtsa bi sadzra ya /
T02D2002:211a-22: ma ma k'a ryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2002:211a-23: de nas aom mu: zhes pas ting nge 'dzin bsdus te /
T02D2002:211a-24: thab khung legs par sbas te gzhag go //
